PCAP Sentry - Network Traffic Analysis Educational Tool
========================================================

PCAP Sentry is a beginner-friendly educational tool for learning malware 
network traffic analysis. Analyze .pcap/.pcapng files to identify suspicious 
patterns with AI-powered guidance and real-world threat intelligence.

KEY FEATURES
------------
* Risk scoring and behavioral detection (beaconing, DNS tunneling, etc.)
* AI-powered chat using local or cloud LLM models
* Credential extraction and C2 pattern detection
* Wireshark integration with auto-generated filters
* Works offline with local models and threat databases

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
-------------------
* Windows 10 or later (64-bit)
* Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable (will be installed if needed)
* 4 GB RAM minimum, 8 GB recommended
* 500 MB disk space
